summary.p: Allows customizing global (i.e. solution-independent) settings that affect which version of ConQAT and the Java Virtual Machine are used by Clone Detective.
To access this dialog box, on the Tools menu, click Options, and then click Clone Detective.

ul.li: ConQAT File Name. Sets the fully qualified path of the conqat.bat file that starts ConQAT and runs the clone detection.
Java Home. Sets the fully qualified path of the directory that is used as the Java Home directory.
